description: Try our easy to follow Cantonese Beef & Hokkien Stir-Fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cantonese Beef & Hokkien StirFry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g rump steak, fat trimmed, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare noodles following packet instructions. Set aside.

Heat 1 tbs vegetable oil and sesame oil in a wok or large frying pan over high heat. Stirfry beef for 2 minutes or until browned. Add garlic and ginger and stir-fry for a further 30 seconds or until fragrant. Set aside.

In same wok, heat remaining vegetable oil over high heat. Stirfry capsicum for 5 minutes or until soft. Add sauce, peas, noodles and 1/2 cup water and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes or until heated through. Add beef and stir-fry for 1 minute or until heated through. Serve topped with coriander and spring onion.
